summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ENT Solutions Voice AI Agent Platform admin functionality. Admin authentication and authorization working correctly. Regular users properly blocked from admin features.

minor_bugs.issue: Admin Panel link in sidebar sometimes not immediately visible after login, requires page refresh or re-navigation
minor_bugs.impact: Minor UX issue - admin functionality works but may require refresh

passed_tests: Admin user can see Admin Panel link in sidebar after login
Admin can access /admin dashboard showing stats (Total Users: 3, Workspaces: 3, Agents: 0, etc.)
Admin dashboard displays 6 stat cards correctly
Admin can access /admin/users page with user management interface
Admin users page shows user search input and user table
Admin can access /admin/content page with tabbed interface
Admin content page has Agents, Call Logs, and Error Logs tabs
All admin content tabs are clickable and functional
Regular user does NOT see Admin Panel link in sidebar
Regular user trying to access /admin is redirected to /dashboard
Regular user trying to access /admin/users is redirected to /dashboard
Regular user trying to access /admin/content is redirected to /dashboard
Admin authorization working correctly via email whitelist
Frontend login authentication flow working properly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Admin Panel link in sidebar sometimes requires page refresh to appear after login. Consider adding a loading state or ensuring the admin status check completes before rendering sidebar.
